```
// Creating a conda environment
$ conda create -n myenv python=3.9 # whatever python version

// List environment
$ conda list env

# conda environments:
#
base                   /home/kartik/anaconda3
myenv                * /home/kartik/anaconda3/envs/myenv
pinnochio_env          /home/kartik/anaconda3/envs/pinnochio_env

// Deactivating environments
$ conda deactivate

// Removing environments
$ conda remove -n myenv --all

// Installing a package, we will try and install the following packages:
// pinnochio, notebook, ipykernel, hpp-fcl
$ conda install -c conda-forge pinochio notebook ipykernel hpp-fcl

// Register ipykernel inside the environment so that we can find it 
// inside notebooks in vscode
$ python -m ipykernel install --user --name=pinocchio_env --display-name 'Python pinocchio_dev'

// 



```
